channel.title: The Pod Delusion
channel.description: The Pod Delusion is a podcast about interesting things - from scepticism, the lefty liberal things, it's commentary from a secular rationalist, Guardianista perspective.
channel.itunes:summary: The Pod Delusion is a podcast about interesting things - from scepticism, the lefty liberal things, it's commentary from a secular rationalist, Guardianista perspective.
channel.itunes:author: The Pod Delusion Podcast
channel.copyright: Copyright ipadio - phonecast live to the World, any phone, anywhere2009.

item.title: The Pod Delusion - Episode 14 - Winterval Special!
item.description: Johnny Ball, Debunking the Nativity, Nativity 2009, Ann Summers at Christmas, Christmas #1, Frosty the Snowman - plus some Winterval Carols!

item.title: The Pod Delusion - Episode 2
item.description: In this edition we have a report from the LibDem conference, an undercover exposé of a shop selling homoeopathic remedies, and reports on NHS cuts, the BNP/Question Time debate, intellectual property and Facebook/Baby culture.

item.title: The Pod Delusion - Episode 1
item.description: In this edition, we talk about Gordon Brown's use of language, product placement on TV, Edge Media TV, school academies, the Darwin Centre at the Natural History Museum, and Derren Brown's latest stunt.
